bilingual.source: The lander lands on the surface of Mars.
bilingual.target: 着陆器降落在火星表面。

bilingual.source: The rover begins to explore the surface of Mars.
bilingual.target: 探测车开始探索火星表面。

bilingual.source: Most of the earth's surface is covered by water.
bilingual.target: 地球表面的大部分被水覆盖。

bilingual.source: Water covers nearly three-quarters of the Earth's surface.
bilingual.target: 水覆盖了地球表面的近四分之三。

bilingual.source: He slumped down onto the hard, white sea and rubbed the smooth, glassy surface.
bilingual.target: 他瘫倒在坚硬的白色海面上，摩擦着光滑的表面。

bilingual.source: More recently, China has sent Chang'e 4 to explore the surface of the far side of the moon.
bilingual.target: 最近，中国派遣了嫦娥四号探测月球背面的表面。

bilingual.source: The cationic surfactant helps to reduce surface tension.
bilingual.target: 阳离子表面活性剂有助于降低表面张力。

bilingual.source: The surface of the water is very calm.

list.abstract: Microsoft Surface是由微软设计与制造的个人计算设备系列，包括平板电脑、笔记本电脑、一体机、手机以及耳机。 Microsoft Surface使用WPF进行开发，结合硬件与软件的新技术，使用者可以直接用手或声音对屏幕作出指令，触摸其他外在物理物来和电脑进行交互，毋须再依赖会令手部劳损的鼠标与键盘。 2024年3月，微软正式推出首批专为商业用户打造的Surface AI PC：Surface Pro 10商用版和Surface Laptop 6商用版，首次把专用Copilot键添加到键盘当中。
surface是一个英语单词，可以用作名词、动词和形容词，作名词时，可以翻译为表面、外观、地面等；作动词时，表示浮出水面、使浮出水面；做形容词时，意为表面的、外表上的、肤浅的。

yingyinNormal.en: The basic idea is that if you're an ant and you live on the surface of the apple, the surface of the apple is your entire universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基本思路就是，如果你是一只蚂蚁，你居住在苹果的表面，苹果的表面就是你的整个宇宙。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not a flat surface at all. Instead, the petal is made up of countless nodules.
yingyinNormal.zh: 花瓣的表面根本一点都不平整，相反 上面布满了无数球形疙瘩。

yingyinNormal.en: The surface of the Earth was like an enormous bubble, heated under pressure to over 700 degrees Celsius.
yingyinNormal.zh: 地球表面就像一个巨大的泡泡，在高压下升温直至达到700多摄氏度。

yingyinNormal.en: What good is a flyby if you can't get Watney off the surface? Watney would intercept using the MAV.
yingyinNormal.zh: 经过定点有什么用？如果你没法让沃特尼离开火星表面？沃特尼可以用微型飞行器拦截。

yingyinNormal.en: A black hole is a strange beast. If this were a black hole, then instead of a rubber surface it would have a surface that is made of absolutely nothing except warped space and time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 黑洞就是一个奇怪的野兽。如果这是个黑洞，那么就不会是个胶面，它会有一个除了弯曲的时空什么也没有的表面。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Loski was clean and smooth on the outside but it seemed like there was something rotten buried just beneath the surface.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯基先生表面上看起来很干净整洁，但他内心似乎装着什么腐烂掉的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: When they hit the surface, the energy of the photons is captured by a ring called the light-harvesting complex.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当光子碰触到叶绿体表面时，光子能量便被一个环状物收集起来我们称之为集光复合体。

yingyinNormal.en: Generally it sits on an invisible surface. You can see stuff sliding down the sides, and disappearing down the drain, as it were.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它位于无形的表面，你看到物体沿着各个面塌陷，并且就跟消失在漏斗中一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Not surprising. You have no safety mat or adhesive stickers to allow for purchase on a surface with a low coefficient of static friction.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不奇怪。你没有装防滑垫或者防滑贴纸来抵消浴缸表面的很低的静摩擦系数。

yingyinNormal.en: You know when the wok's hot enough, when you start to see a little bit of smoke just coming off the surface of the oil and sometimes you can see the oil glisten as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 油表面开始冒出一点白烟时，你就知道锅已经热得差不多了，有时候也会看到油开始发亮。

yingyinNormal.en: What your wife said in South Dakota. Beyond what's pretty and perfect. Liberation from convention, from the past. Beyond surface, beyond bullshit, beyond the election. Beyond marriage. Yes, exactly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你太太在南达科塔州说的话，"超越美丽和完美"，摆脱习俗，过往，超越表面，超越空谈，超越竞选。超越婚姻。正是。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's say she's falling from a 32 story building, about 300 feet, and you are 6 feet tall, maybe 10 feet on your tippy-toes, with your arms above your head holding a door, in hopes of distributing the pressure across a larger surface area, but all you're doing is essentially moving the ground up by 10 feet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比如说她正在从32层楼上落下，差不多300英尺，而你有6英尺高，可能踮起脚尖有10英尺高，你双臂将一扇门举过头顶，期望能够将压力分散作用于一个更大的表面积上，但实际上你所做的只是把着陆点抬高了10英尺。

yingyinNormal.en: My passion bubble's very near the surface, I guess, not gonna lie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大概是因为我的怒气细胞特别发达，我就是这么想的，没骗你。

yingyinNormal.en: And those feelings would surface in a strangely therapeutic way for me through music.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而这些感受浮出水面竟是通过一种神奇的疗法，音乐。

yingyinNormal.en: High surface temperatures limit their aboveground activity to just a few hours a day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 高地表温度让他们只能每天在地表活动几小时。

yingyinNormal.en: I was thinking... Why don't you come down with me? To the surface? We could go right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在想……你和我一起出去好不好？到地面去？我们现在就去。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just funning you, silicon. And that is the most common element in the Earth's surface.
yingyinNormal.zh: 故意逗你呢，是硅。这是地球土壤中最常见的元素。

yingyinNormal.en: Very good. And then a laser will map the reflective surface and voila? Wow. That is amazing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 非常好，然后激光会映射出反射面，瞧瞧。哇，真是太不可思议了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, Dad. I said that? You said that, Dory swam to the surface, and she got taken by some...
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，爸。我那么说？你那么说，多莉就游向海面，结果就被抓走了……

yingyinNormal.en: What's that? Oh, a creamy custard with a caramelized surface. It's really satisfying. Shut up, Zeke!
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么？是一种表层涂上了焦糖的奶冻，很好吃。闭嘴，泽克！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 表面；面；平面；表面积；液体的表层

sense_info_list.zh: 表面; 外部的

examination_example.sentence: How do archaeologists know where to find what they are looking for when there is nothing visible on the <highlight>surface</highlight> of the ground?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当地表上什么也看不着的时候，考古学家怎么知道去哪里寻找他们要找的东西呢?

examination_example.sentence: Most ground surveys involve a lot of walking, looking for <highlight>surface</highlight> clues such as small fragments of pottery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多数地面勘测需要走很多的路，寻找诸如陶器的小碎片一类的地表线索。

sense_info_list.zh: 显露; 暴露; 流露

examination_example.sentence: The conflict has been <highlight>surfacing</highlight> since 2002, when the corporation bought Vermont's only nuclear power plant, an aging reactor in Vernon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这场冲突自2002年起就已经出现，当时这家公司买下了佛蒙特州仅有的核电厂——弗农镇一个日渐老化的反应堆。

sense_info_list.zh: 浮出水面; 水上的

examination_example.sentence: Reading becomes the default state from which you temporarily <highlight>surface</highlight> to take care of business, before dropping back down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阅读成了你的默认状态，只是在你需要处理事务的时候暂时浮出书海，之后再沉浸于阅读之中。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the outside part or uppermost layer of something
sense_info_list.zh: 外层; 表面; 地面

examination_example.sentence: Bacteria have been shown to live on cabin <highlight>surfaces</highlight>, so wash your hands frequently ．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 已有证据表明机舱表面存在细菌，所以要经常洗手。

examination_example.sentence: Each session has a theme, and participants are given a variety of materials and prompts and asked to cover <highlight>surfaces</highlight> with their thoughts and art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每次活动都有一个主题，参与者利用给定的各种材料和提示在墙上表达出他们的想法和艺术作品。

examination_example.sentence: Bacteria are carried by various "media", which can include raw food, moist <highlight>surfaces</highlight> where bacteria have been left, our hands or skin and from coughing or sneezing (打喷嚏) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 细菌通过各种“媒介”携带，包括生的食物、留下细菌的潮湿表面、我们的手或皮肤以及咳嗽或打喷嚏。

examination_example.sentence: Five minutes after that, we placed either bacon or bread on the <highlight>surface</highlight> for 5, 30 or 60 seconds, and then measured the number of bacteria transferred to the food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 五分钟后，我们将培根或面包放在表面上5秒、30秒或60秒，然后测量转移到食物上的细菌数量。

examination_example.sentence: Research or common sense tells us that the best thing to do is keep your hands, utensils and other <highlight>surfaces</highlight> clean.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究或常识告诉我们，最好的办法是保持手部、餐具和其他表面的清洁。

examination_example.sentence: The biggest concern of pumping out water from this deep in the gradual settling down of the land <highlight>surface</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从这么深的地方抽水，最大的问题是土地表面逐渐沉降。

examination_example.sentence: the chance of these bacteria being on most <highlight>surfaces</highlight> is very low.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些细菌在大多数表面的几率非常低。

examination_example.sentence: The overall number of bacteria on the <highlight>surface</highlight> mattered more, and this decreased over time after the initial introduction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 表面的细菌总数更重要，而且在最初引入后，随着时间的推移，细菌数量会减少。

examination_example.sentence: The unpredictability of the real world may bring to the <highlight>surface</highlight> a troubling software problem.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现实世界的不可预知性可能会让一个令人不安的软件问题浮出水面。

examination_example.sentence: These microscopic layers of deposits containing bacteria are known as bio films and they are found on most <highlight>surfaces</highlight> and objects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些含有细菌的微观沉积层被称为生物膜，它们存在于大多数表面和物体上。

examination_example.sentence: We repeated this exact procedure after the bacteria had been on the <highlight>surface</highlight> for 2, 4, 8 and 24 hours.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 细菌在表面停留了2、4、8、24小时后，我们重复了这一步骤。

examination_example.sentence: We wanted to know if the length of time food is in contact with a contaminated <highlight>surface</highlight> affected the rate of transfer of bacteria to the food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们想知道食物与受污染表面接触的时间长短是否会影响细菌向食物转移的速度。

sense_info_list.en: a superficial aspect as opposed to the real nature of something; a superficial aspect as opposed to the real nature of something
sense_info_list.zh: 表面; 非本质

examination_example.sentence: Research found that female managers were more likely than male managers to display "<highlight>surface</highlight> acting".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究发现，女性经理比男性经理更容易表现出“表面功夫”。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Surface</highlight> acting is a prime example of "emotional labor".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 表面表演是“情绪劳动”的一个典型例子。

sense_info_list.zh: 浮出水面; 露出表面

examination_example.sentence: Such findings, which run counter to common sense, have <highlight>surfaced</highlight> before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些与常识相悖的发现以前也曾出现过。

sense_info_list.en: the outer appearance of a person; thing or situation
sense_info_list.zh: 外表; 外观

examination_example.sentence: They find dirty <highlight>surfaces</highlight> and paint them with images or messages using cleaning brushes or pressure hoses (高压水管) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现肮脏的表面，并使用清洁刷或高压水管在上面涂上图像或信息。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 表面上；从外表看；乍一看

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the outside part or uppermost layer of something
sense_info_list.zh: 外层; 表面; 地面

examination_example.sentence: I reported the strange <highlight>surface</highlight> on the skin of the lizard to my husband and children the next morning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第二天早上我向丈夫和孩子告知了蜥蜴皮肤表面的奇怪之处。

examination_example.sentence: Put different types of clothing on different <highlight>surfaces</highlight> in the room.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将不同类型的衣服放在房间的不同表面上。

examination_example.sentence: The dark-colored road <highlight>surface</highlight> makes the youngsters hard to be noticed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 深色的路面使幼鸟很难被注意到。

sense_info_list.en: give a new top layer to
sense_info_list.zh: 铺设(路面); 台面

examination_example.sentence: Why are young birds drawn to the road <highlight>surface</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么幼鸟会被吸引到路面上？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在表面上；表面上；外表上

sense_info_list.en: the outside part or uppermost layer of something
sense_info_list.zh: 外层; 表面; 在外部的

examination_example.sentence: Most of the earth's <highlight>surface</highlight> is covered by water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地球表面的大部分被水覆盖。

examination_example.sentence: Put the pack on a smooth <highlight>surface</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把背包放在一个光滑的表面上。

examination_example.sentence: Take the dumplings out when they float to the <highlight>surface</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 饺子浮到水面就捞出来。
